pageContext.claim: “We're doing awfully well. To stop the offshoring -- you know what offshoring is of American jobs...since then, $876 billion -- that's a lot even for you, Marillyn, right? That's a big number. Has poured back into the United States from abroad.”
pageContext.analysis: The Federal Reserve reported $777 billion was repatriated after the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act in 2018.
